name: Swap Force
description:
A top down shooter where the player's objective is to destroy all the respawn points in the map. The player can take can control of his/her enemies by using the special swap function to further wreak havoc on the enemy ships. Created by Carter Andrews (OccamsLazer) and myself Samuel Shin (hamsambam).

Sound Credits: dj-Jo/Zenpaku (music), Partners in Rhyme (FX), Diangleo (FX),  and Little Robot Sound (FX).
